author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 16, 2020
description: Seventy-five people have now died of COVID-19 in B.C., and 1,561 have had confirmed cases of the disease.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry's daily update is expected in a written statement on Thursday afternoon.
  • B.C. now has 1,561 confirmed cases of COVID-19.
  • 75 people have died.
